Author: cinnamonbicycle
Text: SAME DUDE. I was 117ish when I got out in January and since then my weight has plummeted like 3 BMI points to the mid-high 90s. I've convinced my dietitian to let me maintain soon, but I still need to gain a bit - *just a bit -* and I'm terrified that even a couple pounds will make me look and feel like I did when I was discharged.

Author: noir-
Text: :( do you have any comparison pics you can study? That's a big weight loss, it will show - even if you can't see it!
